name: Hypertus
description:
[b]WARNING: This contains hyper stuff, if you dislike it then leave[/b]

This mods [b]adds[b] [i](not replace)[/i] new body parts that just are like the normal ones but you can upgrade them in a new skill tree that comes with this mod.
Said body parts are in form of breast, penises, vagina, and anus.
This mod also have capability layers that use the looks of your favorite body parts mod, including ones from species mod that add one of the 4 body part categories mentioned.

You can gain experience points of said skill tree by invest in vanilla perks and then sleep, each time you wake up you will be notified how much of them you get.
You can then spend those point to add ridiculous amount of perks to your body parts.
Please do note that some perks might be hidden due to not meeting the requirement for the perk.

There is a draft of the story but it isn't complete in anyway and some glimpse of it can be read in the perks' description.

There are compatibility layers that make all species including the modded one have hyperable version of them

You can transform your or your foe's parts to hyperable with Personal Bluespace Anomaly Emitter™️. You need to finish the Alex's portal quest to get one from his shop

Has compatibility layer between these mods:
 - Synth Bodyparts
 - Fluffy Bodyparts
 - Avali Species Bodyparts
 - Ace's Aviary Addon Bodyparts
 - Trans Scar Chest
 - Crow Species Bodyparts
 - Deer Species Bodyparts
 - Knotted Horse Cock
 - Barbed Equine Penis
 - Spined Dragon Penis

If you have any feedback send it in #mods-discussion and ping me,
or open an issue on [url]https://github.com/CanInBad/HypertusMod/issues[/url].

# Changelog
 * attempt to fix datapack character not being able to create (just create mods yo)
 * removed legacy perks thats about increasing the PP size
 * fixed a typo with breast perk and making it unavailable
 * changed how XP is gained, now will always reliably grant XP reguardless of where you slept. One side effect is it will give it the moment a new day start even in middle of the scenes.
 * changed the experience required to gain a level of skill tree, it starts at being exponential then sqrt root and finally linearly. For more info please see this graph [url]https://www.desmos.com/calculator/ux5ausxblm[/url]
 * Fuck Toy I lube effect now has time scaled base on sexiness
 * Fuck Toy III will now make the effect of Fuck Toy I's lube last outside of SexEngine
 * minor perk description changes to make text rendering ""faster""

## Backend stuff
 * Added new trigger "HypertusNewDay", the Hyper prefix is here because I don't want to mess with others triggers that I didn't know about, It triggers when new day happen.
 * This is not a change but since the perks that responsible for resizing your pp very old version does not exist anymore, if you still have them please open an issue on github and send the save to me.
